analysis.description:
Pinakion.balances (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/2301.sol#57) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/2301.sol#132-169)
	- balanceOfAt (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/2301.sol#241-262)
	- generateTokens (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/2301.sol#334-344)
	- destroyTokens (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/2301.sol#351-361)
Pinakion.isContract (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/2301.sol#425-432) is declared view but contains assembly code

BlockHashRNGFallback.saveRN (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/2301.sol#589-601) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _block < block.number && randomNumber[_block] == 0

Reentrancy in Kleros.passPeriod (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/2301.sol#844-870):
	External calls:
	- rng.requestRN(rnBlock) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/2301.sol#849)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- period (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/2301.sol#850)

Reentrancy in Kleros.passPeriod (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/2301.sol#844-870):
	External calls:
	- randomNumber = rng.getUncorrelatedRN(rnBlock) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/2301.sol#852)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- period (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/2301.sol#854)

Reentrancy in Kleros.passPeriod (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/2301.sol#844-870):
	External calls:
	- rng.requestRN(rnBlock) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/2301.sol#849)
	- randomNumber = rng.getUncorrelatedRN(rnBlock) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/2301.sol#852)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastPeriodChange (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/2301.sol#868)

Pinakion.claimTokens (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/2301.sol#455-465) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/2301.sol#463)

Pinakion.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/2301.sol#392) shadows:
	- Pinakion.min (function @ /../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/2301.sol#435-437)

Reentrancy in Pinakion.approve (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/2301.sol#182-193):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/2301.sol#187)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/2301.sol#190)

Reentrancy in Kleros.receiveApproval (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/2301.sol#821-825):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(pinakion.transferFrom(_from,this,_amount)) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/2301.sol#822)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- jurors (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/2301.sol#824)
